summary: The customer was looking to downgrade their Contoso Wireless service and the customer service agent provided them with information on the basic plan and family plans available. The agent also discussed the Contoso TV package, which includes access to major networks and over 100 channels as well as an on-demand library. The cost for the package is an additional $30 per month when added to one of the family plans. The customer decided to switch to one of the family plans and add the Contoso TV package.
